name: Archio XML Relations to Gemma OAS

mapping.properties: { {% if properties.property|keys == range(0, properties.property|length-1) %}{% for property in properties.property %}"{{ property['@attributes'].propertyDefinitionRef }}": "{{ property.value }}"{% if not loop.last %},{% endif %}{% endfor %}{%else%}{%set property = properties.property %}"{{ property['@attributes'].propertyDefinitionRef }}": "{{ property.value }}"{%endif%} }
